fields.name: Let em Cook. (1x, day):
fields.value: Force a player to be executed immediately. They must have at least one vote from a Non-Unseen member

fields.name: No Phone (Evening):
fields.value: Choose a response. The player who made the response gains 30% less ability charge tonight

fields.name: Queerbaiting (Passive):
fields.value: If you have the Bisexual role, all your abilities except for this one are locked, and you keep your original abilities. At any time, you may remove one of your original abilities to unlock the corrosponding ability (Cant cook and mcdonalds ---> Let em cook; Charge they phone ---> No Phone; Twerk ---> No Dancing; Eat Hot Chip ---> Serve Spicy Food; Lie ---> Truth)

fields.name: Serve Spicy Food:
fields.value: Increase another player's Attack Power by +1.0x but decrease their Defence Power by -0.75x

fields.name: Truth (Passive):
fields.value: A majority of your statements must be truths (Paradoxes and future events count as lies)
